title: How to watch the Canadiens tonight on Amazon Prime Video
author: Steve Faguy
blurb: If you don't want to bother subscribing to Amazon, you can still catch the game on RDS.

title: Montreal weather: You can be thankful for ... the season's first frost

blurb: Is it too soon to think about leftovers?

title: Liveblog replay: Habs fall 6-3 to Penguins on Thanksgiving

blurb: Will the Montreal Canadiens be victorious in their Amazon Prime Video debut?

title: Jack Todd: Undersized players paying off big time for the Canadiens
author: Jack Todd
blurb: Cole Caufield and Lane Hutson are lucky to have a head coach in Montreal who knows all about excelling in a league that skews bigger.
